name: 7D / 6N. Of Cusco, Maras, Moray & Salt Mines,Inca Trail Hike.
description: This exciting tour combines the world famous Inca Trail to Machu Picchu with tours of Cusco, the experimental Incan agricultural site of Moray, and the ancient salt mines of Salinas de Maras. In this tour, we will provide you with accommodation for your entire stay in Cusco.
